238160.notes: Updated mid-2025 based on observed deal activity. Premium range applies to high-margin, process-driven firms.

238220.notes: Includes HVAC firms with service agreements or recurring maintenance contracts.

238210.industry: Electrical Contractors and Other Wiring Installation Contractors
238210.notes: Premium range for firms with significant government or long-term contracts.

general_construction.notes: Represents general construction services, excluding real estate.

public_comps.notes: Equidam dataset for TRBC industry classification; not direct private market comps.
